data.name: Breaking Gates
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Breaking Gates is a 2D action platformer game in a fantastic and animated world. Developed by fans of classic games of the genre, Breaking Gates combines dynamic gameplay and creates a new experience as you explore the map. Collect items, create and unlock a vast array of weapons, equipment and items to defeat countless challenging creatures and bosses who await you in this adventure!

Combat and skills

It is possible to create various combos using your special abilities. Raise the enemy and make an aerial combo! Combine all your skills at the same time creating devastating combos! Move quickly, jump, attack and dodge! Don't let your guard down or you'll be attacked!
As you defeat enemies, fragments will fall and with them you can unlock and evolve the character's new abilities. There are super abilities that are released as your combat energy fills to the maximum.



Collect materials and quipment

There are several different materials that you can collect to improve your equipment. They can release bonuses of different attributes. Unlock legendary weapons to fight those tough-level bosses!


Highlights

■ Frantic 2D platform action game. Several unique combos and different skills to unlock.
■ Fluid movement. Jump, dodge, make air strikes, aerial dash, skill combinations and more.
■ Punitive boss fights! Memorize your movements and fight back with your reflexes and better attacks, each boss fight is unique and challenging.
■ Strengthen your character throughout the journey as you see fit. Manage your attribute points and evolve your skills and equipment with the resources found.
■ Vibrant and colorful art, handmade animation, an easy-to-appreciate world.
■ Original soundtrack. All the songs were made to make the game atmosphere epic and exciting!
■ Strengthen your character throughout the journey as you see fit. Manage your attribute points and evolve your skills and equipment with the resources found.
■ Collect rare materials, make item combinations and manufacture various equipment. Legendary surprise equipment may appear.
■ Explore a vast kingdom in danger with secret passages and chests. Unlock routes with unique skills found. All maps are truly connected like a Metroidvania.
■ Full Gamepad support.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248550

data.short_description: Colorful and fun platform game with exploration! Exciting battles await you! Collect items, create and unlock a vast array of weapons, equipment and skills to defeat countless challenging creatures and bosses.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Thai, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Amd Athlon X2 or intel core 2 duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

highlighted.name: I'm the only one able to bear!
Gadus the warrior of another dimension!
